trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Escondido
There were no other sightings in Escondido on or around August 13th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile on patrol i drove right under a black round object that moved like a bird. It was the size of a gym ball. Did not scare me at all, it did not seem intelligent to me, it was just there. There are no wires in the area. It was close to the road about streetlight height (was not a street light. It was on the I-15 North around Deer Springs Road 1:50 am past Escondido.
Summary: drove under black ball over n I-15 escondido
